overview: 405,000 new vans hit US roads every year. Sprinter vans, Ford Transit vans, and Dodge Promasters are literally everywhere with some media outlets speculating that van life is the new American Dream. I wanted to get to the bottom of why vans are booming so I interviewed 80+ people and made a documentary film about it.
tagline: Why Are Vans Trending & Is Van Life The New American Dream?
title: Van Boom
